entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lévis
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 18.
